title: How do I send a multimedia message?
answer:
1. On the New message screen, write a message. 

 1. Type or select a recipient. 

 1. Touch the menu key and add a theme. The message is automatically converted to a multimedia message. 

 1. Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110538) to add a picture, audio, or video attachment. The message is automatically converted to a multimedia message when a multimedia file is added. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110539)

 2. [Touch Send. ]()
